---
name: User research round
about: Create a task list for rounds of user research
title: "[Research round]"
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

- [ ] Identify participants
- [ ] Reach out
- [ ] Confirm slot
- [ ] Ask if they will allow FS observers
- [ ] Schedule debriefs
- [ ] Prep interview guide + other materials
- [ ] Conduct interview
- [ ] Conduct debrief
- [ ] Encode data
